roleset.name: transfering a deed from one party to another
roleset.note: CONVEYANCING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Corresponds to VNcls send-11.1. (from conveyancing.01-n)

example.name: just arg1
example.text: A company that is professional in the conveyancing of the legal things will be a better choice.

example.name: args 1, 2, 3
example.text: Their role in the property buying process is similar to that of the English solicitor, in as much as the Notaire is responsible for the conveyancing of the property from the present owner to you.

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: In addition to acting for government clients, our real estate team brings leading industry expertise acting for consortia and financiers on their conveyancing of commercial and industrial sites, greenfield sites, development of land and government infrastructure.
example.arg: of commercial and industrial sites, greenfield sites, development of land and government infrastructure
